Value: ORDER BY PL.ADDDATETIME DESC, PL.ALBUM, ABS(PL.TRACK), PL.ID #LIMIT#
AND LASTPLAYDATE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY LASTPLAYDATE DESC #LIMIT#
AND PLAYCOUNT > 2 ORDER BY  PLAYCOUNT / ROUND(JULIANDAY(DATETIME('NOW', 'LOCALTIME')) - JULIANDAY(DATETIME(ADDDATE))) DESC #LIMIT#
AND RATING <> 9 AND PLAYCOUNT > 2 ORDER BY  PLAYCOUNT / ROUND(JULIANDAY(DATETIME('NOW', 'LOCALTIME')) - JULIANDAY(DATETIME(ADDDATE))) DESC #LIMIT#
AND LASTPLAYDATE IS NOT NULL AND PLAYCOUNT > 0 ORDER BY LASTPLAYDATE #LIMIT#
DisplayValue: 最近再生していないもの

Value: AND LASTPLAYDATE IS NULL ORDER BY ADDDATETIME DESC, PL.ALBUM, ABS(PL.TRACK), PL.ID
AND GETFILESIZE(FILEPATH,'') = 0 ORDER BY PL.ID DESC
